query: mutation updatePaper($command: UpdatePaperCommandInput!) { updatePaper(command: $command) { ...paper __typename }}fragment paper on Paper { reference shortName name description body { reference shortName name levels { reference shortName name __typename } __typename } levels { reference shortName name __typename } expiry { expiryOption expiryWeeks studyMode { reference name __typename } __typename } isCba examSchedule timeInHours createdBy createdOn updatedBy updatedOn __typename}
